snippet: The government offered broad vows to lift the incomes of workers and farmers and choke off corrupt wealth but few specific goals to rein in the nation’s wide inequality.
abstract: Chinese government issues long-awaited plan to narrow gulf between rich and poor, offering broad vows to lift the incomes of workers and farmers and choke off corrupt wealth but few specific goals to rein in the nation’s wide inequality.
lead_paragraph: The government offered broad vows to lift the incomes of workers and farmers and choke off corrupt wealth but few specific goals to rein in the nation’s wide inequality.

headline.seo: China Issues Plan to Narrow Income Gap
headline.main: China Issues Proposal to Narrow Income Gap
headline.print_headline: China Issues Proposal To Narrow Income Gap
